translation: "how can we still talk about data privacy when we give away our personal information on social networks? ü§î are we aware of the data we share and how it's used? #dataprivacy #dataprotection"

this post critically examines the topic of data privacy and asks questions about the awareness of individuals regarding their personal information shared on social media platforms. it highlights the irony of discussing data privacy while willingly sharing personal information online. the hashtags #datenprivatsph√§re (data privacy) and #datenschutz (data protection) are used to reach a wider audience and encourage further discussion on the topic.
